name: Passatempo
description: Passatempo is a vanilla flavored sandwich cookies with chocolate filling and drawings on them.

name: Bis
description: Bis are wafer cookies covered in milk, white, or dark chocolate.

name: Festy Chocolate Cookies
description: These scrumptious treats are made of delicious vanilla cream filling that is sandwiched between perfectly crunchy chocolate cookies.

name: Nestle Cocosette
description: Cocosette is the perfect combination of a crunchy cookie wafer filled with delicious coconut cream!

name: Oblita Cubanito Wafer Chocolate
description: Thin tiny wafer cookie roll filled with chocolate cream

name: MANTECOL Clasico
description: Mantecol a typical dessert in Argentina, a sort of semi-soft nougat made from peanut butter. It was originally created and marketed in the 1940s by the confectionery company Georgalos.

name: Chocolate Cri-Cri
description: Cri-Cri is the combination of chocolate with milk and crunchy puffed rice.

name: Bauducco Chocolate Wafers
description: Bauducco Wafers have 3 delicious creamy chocolate layers sandwiched between wholesome and flaky wafers.

name: Field Galleta Con Chocolate Dona Pepa
description: Delicious and very tasty chocolate cover Cookie and Sprinkles. Made up of 2 oblong shaped cookies. Each coated with a thin layer of chocolate milk, stacked on top of each other.

name: Fabitos Pipoca Vovozinha Caramelizada Gourmet Popcorn
description: Salty, sweet, and crunchy popcorn with just the smallest hint of chocolate flavor mixed in with the caramel flavor!
